remarks:
Define pre-ordering relation on positive fractions.  This is a "temporary" set used in the construction of complex numbers ~ df-c , and is intended to be used only by the construction.  Similar to Definition 5 of [Suppes] p. 162.  (Contributed by NM, 28-Aug-1995.) (New usage is discouraged.)
